Love the fit, the look, very comfortable but so elegant. I ordered for a wedding and this dress did not disappoint. Easy to iron and did not wrinkle up while wearing. 评论概述: What came vs what I ordered 🙄

评论概述: Stunning color! Perfect wedding guest dress.
评论详情: I bought the light blue and it was a show stopper. I have never received so many compliments on a dress. I've already shared the link with another guest who asked. You have to take the time to steam it really well and get out all the wrinkles. There were some loose threads to clean up.

I ordered this dress for my mother-of-the-bride dress. It fit like a glove, thankfully, and I didn't have to have it altered. The material held up well for the day, and even though I sweated a bit, there were no stains.
The sizing does not match US sizes, even though it appears to match.  Check specific sizing table conversion of Chinese manufacturer.
This dress is so beautiful on!  I am 5'8 160 I purchased a large and it fits perfectly!  It is a must buy!

I wore this dress a few weeks ago and was pleased with the fit and how it looked - very stylish!  Could be accessorized to glam up or be more subdued.  I wore with some cute sandals and a hat.  The color was as desired and expected.

I now have this dress in several colors!! That’s how much I liked it!! I typically wear a medium (size 8). I have this dress in mediums but the latest was a large (I think by mistake). What I found was that the large hid my pouch better. In the large my stomach looks flatter. Don’t get me wrong, I got massive compliments on the medium. But when I tried on the large, I didn’t feel like I had to hold anything in lol.  It was naturally flattering. So if you have a little bit of a mid-section pouch you would like to hide, try going up one size. My FAVORITE dress from Amazon by far!!

I really, really wanted to like this dress, but the fit is just all over the map. The top has WAY too much fabric, but the skirt is just tight enough that I couldn't go down a size. It's also cheaply made, but I mean, we are on Amazon, so I shouldn't be surprised. Don't waste your time!

This was basically a comfortable dress but didn’t fit me well. The deep green color was very nice and would be a perfect cocktail dress or for attending a wedding.  Hate that I had to return it but do recommend for anyone with slenderer hips.

Amazing on.

The dress fit perfectly for me! Such a classy fit. I was unsure of how it would look for my body type but it is made very well and shows off your figure in the best way. The color was very pretty. Love this dress! Bought it in the dark green and it’s a beautiful. Fits perfectly, it’s very flattering and the length is great for me as I’m 5’0 so it hits right at my ankles. I also love the elastic waist! I’m considering buying this in black now because I need a new staple black dress.
